$comment: Screen Extension Schema (Derived). A derived Extension type for the screen domain that adds presentation metadata for navigation menu integration.

label.$comment: Display label for the extension in host UI (e.g., nav menu item text)

icon.$comment: Icon identifier for the extension in host UI (e.g., Iconify icon name with prefix)

route.$comment: Route path for the extension (e.g., '/hello-world'). Used by navigation.

order.$comment: Sort order for the extension in host UI lists (lower = higher priority)

presentation.$comment: Presentation metadata for screen domain extensions. Drives nav menu auto-population.
